title: EC Granollers
text: Esport Club Granollers is a <a href="List%20of%20football%20clubs%20in%20Spain">football</a> team based in <a href="Granollers">Granollers</a> in the autonomous community of <a href="Catalonia">Catalonia</a>. Founded in 1913, it plays in the <a href="Tercera%20Divisi%C3%B3n">Tercera División – Group 5</a>. Its stadium is Municipal Carrer Girona with a capacity of 2,500.
